game

Class JurrasicWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.World
      • game.JurrasicWorld

  • public class JurrasicWorld
extends World
    Jurrasic World is a world that oversees player to win by breeding a TREX to adult.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the game. On each iteration the gameloop does the following: - displays the player's map - processes the actions of every Actor in the game, regardless of map We could either only process the actors on the current map, which would make time stop on the other maps, or we could process all the actors. We chose to process all the actors. wins: captive TRex grows adult lose: player HP is 0
        Overrides:
        run in class World
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the player doesn't exist

      • stillRunning

        protected boolean stillRunning()
        Returns true if the game is still running. if captive TRex grows adult, stop running else, runs super method to determine to run or not. The game is considered to still be running if the player is still around.
        Overrides:
        stillRunning in class World
        Returns:
        true if the player is still on the map.

      • hasTRexCaptiveBreed

        private boolean hasTRexCaptiveBreed()
        method to check captive TRex grows adult, stop running if true.
        Returns:
        boolean
